titles.title: Salem Maritime National Historical Park Redesignation and Technical Corrections Act
Salem Maritime National Historical Park Redesignation and Technical Corrections Act
To redesignate the "Salem Maritime National Historic Site" as the "Salem Maritime National Historical Park", and for the purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Salem Maritime National Historical Park Redesignation and Technical Corrections Act
This bill redesignates the Salem Maritime National Historic Site in Salem, MA, as the Salem Maritime National Historical Park.
The bill also authorizes the Department of the Interior to acquire an interest in the city of Salem for use as a visitor center and curatorial facility (currently, only authorized as a visitor center).
